subject: Football
lead_paragraph: FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. (AP) — Atlanta Falcons Coach Bobby Petrino said Monday that DeAngelo Hall, a two-time Pro Bowl cornerback, faced “substantial discipline,” which could include a suspension, after Hall lost his composure on the field and on the sideline Sunday against Carolina. The Falcons lost, 27-20, to fall to 0-3.
